title: Franchise value of the Boston Red Sox 2002 to 2019
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, and finally slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 3200.0 was reached at Year 2019
The lowest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 2300.0 was reported at Year 2016
